Project Notes:
Make sure you are in the npm branch

Start Build:Watch before making changes to git-hooks
Use Build:Watch to interactively make changes while debugging

Publishing this package to npm can be done 3 ways:
1) Utilizing the Git hooks
2) Using the scripts, package-ng2-express then update-npm
3) From the project-control debug "npm ngx-modelling"

Utilizing the Git hooks
1) uncomment this line:         //const noop = new TaskNpmPublish
2) then modify any file to start the compile process
3) commit and sync will start the npm publish process
